methods.name: setCanvas
methods.description: Create instance of canvas (HTMLCanvasElement in browser o Canvas in Node)

methods.name: clear
methods.description: Clear canvas, draw background or image (and fit)

name: Emitter
description: Class used for emit and dispatch events

name: Renderer
description: The Renderer is a class for exporting the scene

methods.name: frame
methods.description: Render frame `frameNumber` to Blob or Buffer

methods.name: frameAtTime
methods.description: Render frame at time to Blob or Buffer

methods.name: frameAtTimeToDataUrl
methods.description: Render a frame at `time` to DataUrl

methods.name: zip
methods.description: Render any frame and create array of zip

name: Timeline
description:
Is used for sequence time management.
It is necessary to set the duration and the number of frames per second (frame rate).

methods.name: getFrameTime
methods.description: get the time at specific frame number

methods.name: getFramesCount
methods.description: Get number of frames based on duration and framerate

properties.name: renderer:video_init
properties.description: Called when start video rendering before loading FFmpeg.wasm

properties.name: renderer:video_preparing
properties.description: Called when each frame is rendered and video generation start

properties.name: renderer:zip_preparing
properties.description: Called when each frame is rendered and ZIP generation start
